content: unicorn mandala was my first big mandala pattern and also my first cal it can be made with any kind of yarn as long as you use a hook that fits the yarn pattern features -written pattern in english - us swedish spanish german dutch danish hungarian french bosnian/croatian/serbian italian and brazilian portugese -photos of each round to make the pattern easier to follow -includes a file with photos of stitches used in the pattern please join my facebook group - in annavirkpann s hook up you can ask questions share pictures of your work with my patterns and hang out with other crocheters copyright annavirkpanna 2018 reproduction and publication of pictures and/or pattern is not allowed commercial use is not allowed without my written consent
